question: Yusuf Adil Khan was the son of which of the following king?
explanation: The Adil Shahis wasÂ one of the principal successor states of the Bahmani Sultanate. The Adil Shahis remained in power from 1489 CE to 1686 CE. Yusuf Adil Khan of Turkish descent was the son of king Agha Murad of Turkey.
